enhanced_by.reason: Both methods interact with the queue to either add or remove elements, which can be used to set up the initial state for testing poll().
The factory method initializes the queue, which is necessary to set up the test environment for poll().
Both methods retrieve elements from the queue without removing them, which can be used to verify the state of the queue before and after poll().
Both methods remove elements from the queue, which can be used to verify the behavior and side effects of poll().
